models.name: shopping_mall_categories
models.description: Stores platform-wide product categories that organize the shopping mall's inventory structure with hierarchical relationships. These categories provide the organizational framework for products and enhance product discovery.

foreignFields.name: parent_id
foreignFields.description: Optional parent category for hierarchical organization. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: creator_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who created this category. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Category name that identifies this product category in the shopping mall.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining the purpose and scope of this product category.

plainFields.name: slug
plainFields.description: URL-friendly version of the category name used in product navigation.

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Integer value determining the display order of this category in navigation.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether this category is currently visible to customers.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this category was created in the system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this category was last modified.

models.name: shopping_mall_category_hierarchy
models.description: Represents the hierarchical relationships between shopping mall categories, enabling multi-level category structures. This table supports category nesting and tree-like organizational patterns.

foreignFields.name: ancestor_id
foreignFields.description: The ancestor category in the hierarchy relationship. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: descendant_id
foreignFields.description: The descendant category in the hierarchy relationship. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: relation_creator_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who established this hierarchical relationship. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: depth
plainFields.description: The level of separation between ancestor and descendant categories in the hierarchy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this hierarchical relationship was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this hierarchical relationship was last modified.

models.name: shopping_mall_platform_settings
models.description: Stores configurable platform-wide settings for the shopping mall e-commerce system. These settings control global platform behavior, policies, and operational parameters.

foreignFields.name: updated_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who last modified these platform settings. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: setting_key
plainFields.description: Unique key identifying the specific platform setting (e.g., 'site_name', 'currency', 'tax_rate').

plainFields.name: setting_value
plainFields.description: Current value of the platform setting, stored as text to accommodate various data types.

plainFields.name: setting_type
plainFields.description: Data type of the setting value (string, integer, decimal, boolean, json).

plainFields.name: category
plainFields.description: Grouping category for the setting (e.g., 'general', 'payment', 'shipping', 'display').

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description explaining the purpose and impact of this setting.

plainFields.name: is_encrypted
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether this setting value is encrypted at rest.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the setting (active, inactive, deprecated).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this setting was first created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this setting was last modified.

models.name: shopping_mall_search_terms
models.description: Records popular and frequently searched terms within the shopping mall platform, supporting search optimization, autocomplete features, and trend analysis.

foreignFields.name: trend_analyzer_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator associated with analyzing search trends. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: search_term
plainFields.description: The actual search query entered by users in the shopping mall platform.

plainFields.name: search_count
plainFields.description: Number of times this search term has been used by platform users.

plainFields.name: last_searched_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this search term was most recently used.

plainFields.name: first_searched_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this search term was first recorded by the system.

plainFields.name: is_blocked
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether this search term is blocked from results.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this search term was first recorded in the system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this search term record was last modified.

models.name: shopping_mall_site_policies
models.description: Contains the official policies and terms of service that govern the shopping mall platform, providing legal compliance and user guidelines.

foreignFields.name: approved_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who approved this policy version. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

foreignFields.name: last_updated_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who made the last update to this policy. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: policy_name

plainFields.name: policy_key

plainFields.name: content

plainFields.description: Semantic version number for this policy iteration.

plainFields.name: effective_date

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the policy (draft, approved, deprecated).

plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this policy was last modified.

plainFields.name: deleted_at

models.description: Represents a user's shopping cart containing products they intend to purchase. Each customer has exactly one active cart at a time, which persists across sessions. The cart tracks items, quantities, prices, and other purchase details before checkout. This is a primary entity as users directly interact with their carts, managing items and proceeding to checkout independently.

foreignFields.description: Customer who owns the cart. {@link shopping_mall_customers.id}.
foreignFields.name: shopping_customer_id

plainFields.name: updated_at

plainFields.description: Timestamp when the cart was soft-deleted.

models.description: Represents individual items within a shopping cart. Contains the specific product/SKU, quantity, price at time of addition, and other details about each item in a cart. This is a supporting entity (subsidiary) as it exists to support the shopping_mall_carts table and has no independent management or API operations outside the context of its parent cart.

models.name: shopping_mall_wishlists
models.description: Represents a user's wishlist containing products they want to save for future purchase. Users can have multiple wishlists with different purposes (e.g., gifts, personal items). Wishlists are independent entities that users can create, rename, delete, and share. This is a primary entity as users independently manage their wishlists regardless of any single cart or product context.

plainFields.description: Indicates if this is the user's default wishlist.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the wishlist was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the wishlist was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory
models.description: Core inventory tracking entity that maintains current stock levels for all product variants (SKUs) in the e-commerce platform. This table is the primary source of truth for inventory availability and prevents overselling by ensuring real-time stock accuracy. Each record represents the current state of inventory for a specific SKU.

foreignFields.name: shopping_product_variant_id
foreignFields.description: The product variant (SKU) being tracked. {@link shopping_mall_product_variants.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_seller_id
foreignFields.description: The seller responsible for this inventory. {@link shopping_mall_sellers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_location_id
foreignFields.description: The physical or virtual location where inventory is stored. {@link shopping_mall_sellers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_warehouse_id
foreignFields.description: The warehouse managing this inventory. {@link shopping_mall_sellers.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Current stock count for this SKU. Must be a non-negative integer reflecting available inventory.

plainFields.name: reserved_quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity of inventory reserved for pending orders that have not yet been confirmed. Prevents overselling.

plainFields.name: available_quantity
plainFields.description: Calculated field representing quantity available for sale (quantity - reserved_quantity).

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Current inventory status (in_stock, low_stock, out_of_stock) used for business logic and user interface.

plainFields.name: cost_price
plainFields.description: Per-unit cost price of the inventory for accounting and profit calculation purposes.

plainFields.name: last_count_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when the physical inventory count was last performed for accuracy verification.

plainFields.name: count_accuracy
plainFields.description: Percentage accuracy rating of the current inventory count based on recent physical audits.

plainFields.name: reorder_point
plainFields.description: Minimum quantity level that triggers automatic restocking alerts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this inventory record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this inventory record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp. When set, this inventory is considered deactivated but retains history.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshot table that captures point-in-time states of inventory records for audit, reporting, and recovery purposes. Each snapshot preserves the complete state of an inventory record at a specific moment, allowing the system to reconstruct inventory levels at any previous date and track changes over time.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory record this snapshot is capturing. {@link shopping_mall_inventory.id}.

foreignFields.name: created_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who created or triggered this snapshot. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

foreignFields.name: created_by_seller_id
foreignFields.description: The seller who created or triggered this snapshot. {@link shopping_mall_sellers.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Stock count at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: reserved_quantity
plainFields.description: Reserved quantity at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: available_quantity
plainFields.description: Available quantity at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Inventory status at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: cost_price
plainFields.description: Cost price at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: reorder_point
plainFields.description: Reorder point at the time of snapshot.

plainFields.name: snapshot_type
plainFields.description: Type of snapshot created: scheduled, manual, adjustment, transfer, writeoff, audit.

plainFields.name: source
plainFields.description: Source of the snapshot: UI, API, batch process, import, system trigger.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this snapshot was created, which is the point-in-time being captured.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_adjustments
models.description: Table that records manual inventory adjustments made by administrators, warehouse managers, or automated processes. These adjustments account for discrepancies between system records and physical counts, handling scenarios like received shipments, damaged goods, and stock corrections. Each adjustment represents a delta change to inventory levels.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory record being adjusted. {@link shopping_mall_inventory.id}.

foreignFields.name: admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who authorized this adjustment. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

foreignFields.name: suspended_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who suspended or reverted this adjustment. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

foreignFields.name: warehouse_manager_id
foreignFields.description: The warehouse manager responsible for this adjustment. {@link shopping_mall_sellers.id}.

foreignFields.name: approver_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who approved this adjustment. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: previous_quantity
plainFields.description: Inventory quantity before the adjustment was applied.

plainFields.name: new_quantity
plainFields.description: Inventory quantity after the adjustment was applied.

plainFields.name: quantity_delta
plainFields.description: Change in inventory quantity (new_quantity - previous_quantity).

plainFields.name: type
plainFields.description: Type of adjustment: positive, negative, or transfer_out.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Justification for the adjustment (received_shipment, physical_count, damage, counting_error, expired).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed explanation of why the adjustment was necessary.

plainFields.name: adjustment_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when the actual physical adjustment occurred.

plainFields.name: adjustment_status
plainFields.description: Current status of the adjustment: pending, approved, rejected, completed.

plainFields.name: approval_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when the adjustment was approved by the administrator.

plainFields.name: suspension_reason
plainFields.description: Reason why this adjustment was suspended or reverted.

plainFields.name: suspension_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when this adjustment was suspended.

plainFields.name: adjustment_source
plainFields.description: Source of the adjustment: manual, automated, import, system.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this adjustment record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this adjustment record was last updated.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_history
models.description: Subsidiary table that maintains a complete historical record of all changes to inventory levels over time. This table aggregates data from inventory snapshots, adjustments, transfers, write-offs, and other inventory movements to provide a comprehensive audit trail of stock changes. It is designed to support reporting, analytics, and inventory trend analysis.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory record this history entry relates to. {@link shopping_mall_inventory.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_adjustment_id
foreignFields.description: The specific inventory adjustment that caused this change. {@link shopping_mall_inventory_adjustments.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_transfer_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory transfer that caused this change. {@link shopping_mall_inventory_transfers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_writeoff_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory write-off that caused this change. {@link shopping_mall_inventory_writeoffs.id}.

foreignFields.name: created_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who initiated or approved the change. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity_before
plainFields.description: Inventory quantity before the change occurred.

plainFields.name: quantity_after
plainFields.description: Inventory quantity after the change was applied.

plainFields.name: quantity_delta
plainFields.description: Net change in inventory quantity for this event.

plainFields.name: change_type
plainFields.description: Type of inventory change: adjustment, transfer_in, transfer_out, writeoff, sale, restock.

plainFields.name: change_source
plainFields.description: Source of the change: system, user, API, import, batch.

plainFields.name: change_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for the change, corresponding to the specific event that caused it.

plainFields.name: location_from
plainFields.description: Previous location for transfer events. {@link shopping_mall_locations.id}.

plainFields.name: location_to
plainFields.description: New location for transfer events. {@link shopping_mall_locations.id}.

plainFields.name: warehouse_from
plainFields.description: Previous warehouse for transfer events. {@link shopping_mall_warehouses.id}.

plainFields.name: warehouse_to
plainFields.description: New warehouse for transfer events. {@link shopping_mall_warehouses.id}.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Inventory status after the change was applied.

plainFields.name: is_reversal
plainFields.description: Indicates if this change reverses a previous inventory event.

plainFields.name: reversal_for_id
plainFields.description: Reference to the inventory history record being reversed. {@link shopping_mall_inventory_history.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this change was recorded in the system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this history record was last updated.

plainFields.name: processed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this change was processed and reflected in inventory counts.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_thresholds
models.description: Table that defines configurable thresholds for inventory levels that trigger automated alerts and business workflows. These thresholds represent the business rules for when inventory should be monitored or action should be taken, such as low-stock alerts, reorder triggers, and high-stock warnings. Each threshold is associated with a specific inventory record.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inventory_id
foreignFields.description: The inventory record this threshold applies to. {@link shopping_mall_inventory.id}.

foreignFields.name: created_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who created this threshold. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

foreignFields.name: last_modified_by_admin_id
foreignFields.description: The administrator who last modified this threshold. {@link shopping_mall_administrators.id}.

plainFields.name: low_stock_threshold
plainFields.description: Minimum quantity level that triggers low-stock alerts.

plainFields.name: reorder_threshold
plainFields.description: Quantity level that triggers automatic reorder processes.

plainFields.name: high_stock_threshold
plainFields.description: Maximum quantity level that triggers high-stock alerts to prevent overstocking.

plainFields.name: alert_recipients
plainFields.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses or user IDs to notify when thresholds are crossed.

plainFields.name: notification_method
plainFields.description: Preferred method for threshold alerts: email, in_app, both.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether this threshold configuration is currently active and being monitored.

plainFields.name: alert_frequency
plainFields.description: How often to send alerts after threshold is crossed: once, hourly, daily, weekly.

plainFields.name: alert_snooze_until
plainFields.description: Timestamp until which alerts for this threshold should be suspended.

plainFields.name: escalation_level
plainFields.description: Severity level for alerts (1-5), determining escalation path and response time requirements.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this threshold record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this threshold record was last updated.
